title: Participation and Retention Strategy Development for Icelandic LMOOC Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Icelandic Grammar and Everyday Conversational Skills
context.additional_context: Learning Environment for In-Service Professionals Requiring Flexible Time Management. Enhanced Contextual Language Training via VR Simulation

learning_goals: Learners can apply Icelandic grammar structures in stages with 90% accuracy according to scaffolding strategies.
Learners can maintain ≥3 hours of weekly study time through self-directed learning planning.
Learners can achieve ≥80% communication efficiency in situational dialogue scenarios using VR simulations.
Learners can develop ≥3 language usage cases applicable to real-life contexts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
